channel.title: How do i insert a picture on this forum?
channel.description: Hi can someone help me i need to know how you insert a image ? From my pictures folder. Please put in neat and clear steps, Thankyou for the help.

item.title: How do i insert a picture on this forum?
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

1)ok, first of all i would go to www.photobucket.com and make an account there…
2)upload your pictures to photobucket and then once they have uploaded below the picture you get a [img] tag with an url beside it
3) copy the [img] tag code onto moparscape , and viola you have your picture on mopar

other option :

  1. click on the additional options tab at the bottom of your screen when you are posting
    2)and use the attach bar to attach your pictures, just be aware people wont see them until they go into them i think

see you god of ikiliki , bet me to it , i was typing it up when you posted

Read full topic
item.source: How do i insert a picture on this forum?

item.title: How do i insert a picture on this forum?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

First go to
www.imageshack.us
Than upload the picture you want
You will get a link to the picture and paste it on this forums

Make it look like this

[img]Link Here[/img]

Read full topic
